headerDisplay:
Homebridge plugin for Electra Smart A/C
To retrieve credentials (`imei` && `token`), you must run `electra-extract` command in terminal

imei.title: IMEI
imei.description: This value can be obtain via terminal command: `electra-extract`

token.title: Token
token.description: This value can be obtain via terminal command: `electra-extract`

disableFan.title: Disable Fan Accessory
disableFan.description: Disable FAN mode control - remove extra fan accessory

disableDry.title: Disable Dry Accessory
disableDry.description: Disable DRY mode control - remove extra dehumidifier accessory

statePollingInterval.title: AC Device Status Polling Interval in Seconds
statePollingInterval.description: Time in seconds between each status polling of the Electra devices (set to 0 for no polling)

minTemperature.title: Minimum Temperature
minTemperature.description: Minimum Temperature to show in HomeKit

maxTemperature.title: Maximum Temperature
maxTemperature.description: Maximum Temperature to show in HomeKit

swingDirection.title: Swing Direction Control
swingDirection.description: Choose what kind of swing you would like to control in HomeKit

excludeList.title: Devices to exclude (Name/ID/Serial/Mac)
excludeList.description: Add devices identifier (Name, ID from logs or serial from Home app) to exclude from homebridge

debug.title: Enable Debug Logs
debug.description: When checked, the plugin will produce extra logs for debugging purposes

layout.title: Devices to exclude (Name/ID/Serial/Mac)
layout.description: Add devices identifier (Name, ID from logs or serial from Home app) to exclude from homebridge

layout.title: Advanced Settings
layout.description: Don't change these, unless you understand what you're doing.
